channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Navy Vet’s Attorney In CNN Defamation Case Implores Jury To ‘Stand Up Against Fake News’
item.description: Young's lead attorney, Vel Freedman, implored jurors to 'send a message.'

item.title: House Dems threaten to block Trump's big tariff plans: 'Unacceptable'
item.description: A group of House Democrats is pushing to block President-elect Donald Trump from being able to impose his sweeping plan for tariffs.

item.title: Good Riddance, Deb Haaland
item.description: As the nation's public land chief, Haaland's top priority at the Interior Department seemed to be closing public property for development.

item.title: Connecticut’s Nonsensical Plan to Subsidize Strikes
item.description: A proposed workers’ rights bill will worsen Connecticut’s affordability crisis and ignite labor unrest.

item.title: SCOTUS Unanimously Upholds TikTok Ban
item.description: The Supreme Court upheld Congress' TikTok ban, ruling it does not infringe on the First Amendment. The ban is set to take effect Sunday.

item.title: The Best Way For Trump To Stick It To WHO Is To Stick With It
item.description: Trump should mold the WHO into an organization that serves countries and their populations — not profit — and replace it if he can't.

item.title: The Week: Trump’s Second Term Approaches

item.title: Why A Federal Ban On Red Dye No. 3 Is Actually Conservative
item.description: It’s time to care more about our children’s health than the profits of corporations that use manipulative tactics to promote junk food.
